text: @JohnCornyn Finally last week a testing site was set up at the CVS in my neighborhood. We need it now since Abbott opened the beaches and everyone in south TX made a beeline for the TX coast for Memorial Day. But open the economy, right? The surge in Covid19 cases says it was way too soon.
